specialization: I specialize in creating and improving one-page websites. My task is to make your website beautiful and functional, not by manufacturing, but by making sure it works correctly and looks as intended. I pay attention to every detail to ensure your website looks and functions flawlessly.
react_descr: Component-based architecture, state management with hooks (useState, useEffect), routing with React Router, context management (Context API).
html_css_js_descr: Semantic HTML, cross-browser compatibility, responsive design, Accessibility, Flexbox, Grid, Pixel Perfect.
javascript_descr: ES6+, closures, asynchronous programming (Promise, async/await), DOM manipulation, API interactions.
build_tools_descr: Gulp, Vite, Parcel for task automation, resource optimization, and project bundling.
css_preprocessors_descr: CSS, Less, Sass, Bootstrap, Tailwind, CSS Animations, GSAP Animations.
version_control_descr: Git, GitHub, GitLab, Version control best practices.
